footer.slogan: A smart shopping experience for the city of Tlemcen.

hero.slide2_subheading: Save big on your favorite items every week.

about.title: About Tlemcen Smart Supermarket
about.subtitle: Our mission is to bring convenience and quality to our community.
about.p1: Tlemcen Smart Supermarket was founded on a simple principle: make quality grocery shopping easy and accessible for everyone in Tlemcen. We combine the best of local products with the convenience of online shopping.
about.p2: Our team is dedicated to selecting the freshest products, providing exceptional customer service, and ensuring your order arrives at your doorstep quickly and safely.
about.p3: We're more than just a supermarket; we're a part of the community. We support local farmers and producers, and strive to make a positive impact in our beloved city.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Send us a message or pay us a visit.

legal.p1_text: We collect information you provide directly to us. For example, we collect information when you create an account, place an order, or communicate with us. This information may include your name, email, shipping address, and order history.
legal.p2_text: We use the information we collect to:
legal.p2_l1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services;
legal.p2_l2: Process transactions and send you related information, including confirmations and invoices;
legal.p2_l3: Communicate with you about products, services, offers, and events offered by us.
legal.p3_text: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this Privacy Policy or with your consent.
legal.p4_text: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
legal.p5_text: We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy and, in some cases, we may provide you with additional notice.
legal.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
legal.t1_text: By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Service.
legal.t2_text: You must be at least 18 years of age to use this Website. By using this Website and by agreeing to these Terms, you warrant and represent that you are at least 18 years of age.
legal.t3_text: When you create an account with us, you must provide us with information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.
legal.t4_text: We reserve the right to refuse or cancel your order at any time for certain reasons including but not limited to: product or service availability, errors in the description or price of the product or service, error in your order or other reasons.
legal.t5_text: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Algeria, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
